Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals take a 1-0 lead into the next game of the series against the Washington Nationals.
Washington has a 36-40 record in home games, and Kansas City has a 38-38 record on the road.
The matchup is the second time these teams square off this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Luis Garcia leads the Nationals with a.280 batting average and 25 doubles, triples, and 16 home runs.
Jose Tena is 11-for-39 with a home run and three RBI over the past 10 games.
Maikel Garcia has 27 doubles, five triples, and seven home runs for the Royals.
Bobby Witt Jr. is 13-for-35 with three doubles and two home runs over the past 10 games.
